org.nd4j.linalg.factory

Class BaseNDArrayFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nd4j.linalg.factory.BaseNDArrayFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NDArrayFactory
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CpuNDArrayFactory, JCublasNDArrayFactory

    public abstract class BaseNDArrayFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements NDArrayFactory
    Base NDArrayFactory class.

    Allows specification or data type and row (c) or column(fortran) major order
